name: Legacy of Lesbian Kingdom
description:
Made by Vistram and DragonZlay for THJam4

Credits: 

Team Shanghai Alice and ZUN own Touhou and all characters present.

Music, Sound Effects, Art, and Writing all created by Vistram (@Vistram_)

Thank you for playing!
